title: Max Payne 3 Complete Edition v1.0.0.114 All DLCs-REPACK
description:
Included DLCs:

Max Payne 3: Cemetery Map
Max Payne 3: Classic Max Payne Character
Max Payne 3: Deadly Force Burst
Max Payne 3: Deathmatch Made In Heaven Pack
Max Payne 3: Hostage Negotiation Pack
Max Payne 3: Local Justice Pack
Max Payne 3: Painful Memories Pack
Max Payne 3: Pill Bottle Item
Max Payne 3: Silent Killer Loadout Pack
Max Payne 3: Special Edition Pack

Repack Features

    Based on Max.Payne.3-RELOADED ISO release: 26.7 GB
    All released DLCs added, 850 MB
    Game patched to v1.0.0.114
    100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
    NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
    Though all DLCs for Max Payne 3 included in this repack, ALL these DLCs are actually multiplayer-only and cannot be activated in v1.0.0.114 as of now. So these DLCs made as an optional download and you can skip downloading and installing them.
    Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 27.5 to 15.6/16 GB)
    Installation takes 60-120 minutes (depending on your system - load on HDD and number of CPU cores)
    After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
    HDD space after installation: 30 GB (~46 GB during installation)
    Repack by FitGirl



Game troubleshooting

    Rockstar Games Social Club MUST be installed for crack to work, so don't skip it while installing the game
    If you have it installed already (maybe even a newer version) - it should work just fine. I had the latest version of RGSC installed and the game worked perfectly
    Installer copies necessary offline profile files to Rockstar Games folder, but if after launching the game you get the RSC "No profiles found" error, copy all folders and files from "_Offline Profile" folder to "C:%Username%DocumentsRockstar Games" folder and try again
    If it still doesn't help, block MaxPayne3.exe in your firewall



Problems during installation?

If you experience errors (Xdelta or Unarc ones) during installation, try the following things:

    Make sure your Windows username doesn't contain non-latin symbols. Use only latin characters & numbers
    Re-hash torrent (in Utorrent point to the game entry, stop download/upload, then click right mouse button, then click "Force Re-check")
    Disable antivirus (INCLUDING Windows Defender), it can delete installation files or cracks on-the-fly
    Set UAC to a minimum level, otherwise some parts of the installer won't run due to restricted rights
    Make sure you have at least as two times more virtual memory, than actual, physical RAM
    Make sure you have enough space on target drive & on C: drive (or whatever system drive you have)
    Try install the game NOT to C: (system) drive OR specifically to C: drive (Windows rights system is a tricky thing)
    Check your Windows folder (and below) for unarc.dll - if this file exists, delete it
    Run setup with proper rights

Interface Language: English, French, German, Italian, Russian, Spanish, Polish, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese-Brazil
Audio Language: English
Crack: built-in (RELOADED)

Minimum requirements:
Operating System: Windows 7 32/64 Service Pack 1, Windows Vista 32/64 Service Pack 2, Windows XP 32/64 Service Pack 3
Processor: Processor: Intel Dual Core 2.4 GHZ - i7 3930K 6 Core x 3.06 GHZ / AMD Dual Core 2.6 GHZ - FX8150 8 Core x 3.6 GHZ
RAM: 2 GB

DirectX: 9.0c
HDD Space: 30 GB (~46 GB during installation)
